Timeline.subheading: Clear cooperation plan from contact to project completion

step1.title: Contact and Needs Analysis
step1.content: Contact us via form, phone, or email. We'll discuss your business, goals, and expectations. Share materials (photos, logo, colors, sections) so we can better understand your needs and recommend the best solutions.

step2.title: Pricing and Planning
step2.content: Based on the collected information, we'll prepare a quote and project schedule. After cost approval, we create an action strategy and website structure, defining key functions and elements that will support your business goals.

step3.title: Content and Layout Preparation
step3.content: We'll present content and layout proposals tailored to your brand and business goals. At this stage, you can provide feedback and suggestions that we'll incorporate before starting website construction.

step4.title: Development and Optimization
step4.content: We execute the project, creating a responsive, fast, and optimized website. We ensure its performance, SEO, and proper functioning across all devices.

step5.title: Testing and Deployment
step5.content: We thoroughly check every element of the site â€“ forms, links, functionalities. After your final approval, we deploy the site to the server, configure email and analytics tools.

step6.title: Post-Launch Support
step6.content: After launch, we offer technical support and development opportunities to ensure your website always meets expectations.

Faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subheading: Learn more about our work, website development process and benefits

Question1.question: Why do we use Next.js for website development?
Question1.answer: Next.js is a modern technology that provides exceptional speed, excellent SEO optimization, and high performance. Websites built with Next.js load instantly and are better indexed by Google. Additionally, maintenance costs are minimal as websites can run on free Vercel hosting â€“ a platform created by Next.js developers.

Question2.question: How much does a website cost?
Question2.answer: The price depends on the chosen package and project complexity. Simple landing pages start from 1,300 PLN net, while more complex projects start from 2,500 PLN net. For advanced solutions, the price is determined individually.

Question3.question: How long does website development take?
Question3.answer: Development time depends on the chosen package. A simple website can be ready in 5-7 business days, while more complex projects take 7 to 30 days. The speed of delivery also depends on the client providing materials.

Question4.question: Can I edit the content on the website?
Question4.answer: Yes, with the 'Professional' and 'Premium Solution' packages, you get access to a content management system (CMS) that allows you to edit content independently without programming knowledge.

Question5.question: Will the website be visible in Google?
Question5.answer: Yes, all our websites are SEO-optimized, which increases their visibility in search engines and improves rankings.

Question6.question: Can I add additional features to the website?
Question6.answer: Yes, you can order additional features such as dark/light mode, reviews module, newsletter, AI chatbot, or e-commerce functionality.

Question7.question: What technical support do you offer?
Question7.answer: We offer technical support for a specified period after website deployment (1 to 6 months depending on the package). You can also order additional support package after this period.

Question8.question: Will I have full rights to the website after project completion?
Question8.answer: Yes, after project completion, you receive full rights to the website and code, as well as all necessary access credentials.
